activities.name: Dancing to the Oldies
activities.description: Lots of jammin'n going on here. free up your mind and loosen up the muscles and lets dance together as the beat drops high, join us, for it gonna be the best dance event ever

activities.name: Aqua Aerobis at YMCA
activities.description: Exercising in water provides a supportive environment for your body. The buoyancy of the water reduces your weight on impact, resulting in much less strain on your muscles and joints. This makes aqua aerobics a good choice of low impact fitness class for those new to exercise, those who can't move easily, and those who want to get fit and lose weight.

activities.name: Bay Area Ridge Trails- Presidio to Marin Headlands
activities.description: The star to this stretch of trail is none other than San Francisco’s Golden Gate Bridge. One of the less strenuous paths, this short walk also is accessible by wheelchair. As with any bridge, wind conditions are unpredictable, so be sure to carry an extra layer of clothing (scarves or pullovers) to confront extra breezy day.

activities.name: Sip Sip Hooray: cooWine Tasting
activities.description: Come and taste some wine  where you sample different bottles of wine, compare vintages and regional varieties, and enjoy some lively discussions.

activities.name: Cooking for 2
activities.description: Come and learn to cook for twogit

activities.name: Chess Club
activities.description: Like the name suggests, Chess Club is a club where people of all experience and skill level come to play. After a short lesson, members play against each other, sometimes matched against each other based on skill, but most times you play who you want to play. All boards, clocks, and pieces are provided. We also participate in tournaments against other clubs.

activities.name: Skillful Senior: Computers for Beginners
activities.description: offers a “quick, easy, and fun” interface that helps seniors learn computer basics. The site is designed for beginner to intermediate users and focuses on basic computer skills, including how to use a mouse, typing techniques, and computer ergonomics. This means tips on the proper ways to hold a mouse and how to sit in front of a computer to avoid eye or neck strain. By mastering these basic skills, you can use a wide range of programs that enable you to connect with your doctor, join virtual events, or video calls with loved ones.

activities.name: Bingo Night
activities.description: Come play bingo and socialize with your friends or meet new friends.Bingo cards will be available at $2 per card. Various types of bingo will be played including four corner, diamond, butterfly and more. Persons will also be able to win prizes.  Food and drinks will be on sale.

activities.name: Santa Maria Horseback Ride
activities.description: Horesback riding on some open trails

activities.name: Christmas Concert
activities.description: Experience the magic of Christmas and let yourself be moved by traditional Christmas songs and melodies by W. A. ​​Mozart, F. Mendelssohn and G. F. Haendel, interpreted by the superb voices of soprano Aleksandra Buczek and tenor Emil Alekperov. We look forward to seeing you for this exciting concert in the magnificent hall of the Caravita Church in the heart of San Jose.

activities.name: Group Tennis
activities.description: Socialize with opponents and partners is a huge benefit of the game! You will be around others who share similar interests and goals, which is very physiologically rewarding. Its a great way for you to make new friends with common interests.

location.street: LEVI'S® STADIUM 4900 Marie P DeBartolo Way

activities.name: Karaoke Night
activities.description: Either you sing in the shower or in front of an audience it's a really good way to express yourself. Music lets us connect with each other and improve our mood.Join us and don't forget by the end of the night we will all be together and sing the same song ,hanging all together like a family

activities.name: Casino night
activities.description: Casion Night-Along with cocktails and munchies, this will be an evening of innocent fun at the poker, blackjack and roulette tables

activities.name: Woodworking Class
activities.description: This class provides a foundation for beginning woodworkers. Students will learn and practice workshop fundamentals during the five class sessions. Each class session is four hours.
